# Mouseion

> Unified media manager for movies, books, audiobooks, music, podcasts, and TV shows

Fresh ground-up rewrite based on Radarr architecture. Clean `Mouseion.*` namespace, modern stack (.NET 8.0, React 19, Serilog, OpenTelemetry).

## Architecture

**Current Phase**: Phase 0 - Mouseion.Common migration (5 PRs merged)

**Target**: Backend for bit-perfect audio streaming

**Timeline**: 8 weeks total, Week 3 streaming endpoint ready for integration testing

## Standards

- GPL-3.0 license (Radarr derivative)
- Self-documenting code, minimal comments
- Industry-standard C# naming (PascalCase classes, camelCase parameters, _camelCase private fields)
- Performance-conscious patterns (64KB buffers, early exits, compiled regexes)
- Zero AI tropes in code/docs
